acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accordingly the accused person is to suffer RI of 6 (Six) months for the section 363 of the IPC and RI of 10 (Ten) years and to pay a fine of Rs. 1,000/- (one thousand) i/d SI of 2 (Two) Months for the section 6 of POCSO Act. Set off earlier detention if any.
